laboratory_examinations.findings: White-cell count: 5100 per cubic millimeter (67% neutrophils, 17% lymphocytes, 7% monocytes, and 7% bands); Hemoglobin: 12.9 g per deciliter; Platelet count: 132,000 per cubic millimeter.
Sodium level: 134 mmol per liter; otherwise normal.

Alanine aminotransferase: 95 U per liter (normal value, <49); Aspartate aminotransferase: 102 U per liter (normal value, <40); Alkaline phosphatase: 66 U per liter (normal range, 27 to 129); Total bilirubin: 0.8 mg per liter (normal range, 0.3 to 1.2).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Elevated aminotransferase levels are a nonspecific finding that can result from a range of infectious and noninfectious processes.

laboratory_examinations.date: Two days after beginning doxycycline therapy
laboratory_examinations.findings: R. typhi IgM titers: >1:64; IgG titers: 1:512.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The fever and headache resolved within 72 hours after starting doxycycline.
